search.query: | snhostsearch filter="net_info.agg!=internet" | addinfo | spath first_seen | eval host_first_seen=strptime(first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eval diff_host_start=(tonumber(host_first_seen) - info_min_time) | search diff_host_start < 0 | rename first_seen as "Host First Seen" | spath services_count | search services_count > 1 | spath path=services{} output=service_info | mvexpand service_info | spath ip | spath input=service_info path=values{} output=service_details | mvexpand service_details | spath input=service_details | eval start_seen=strptime(first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eval diff_start=(tonumber(start_seen) - info_min_time) | search diff_start > 0 | eval diff_end=(info_max_time - tonumber(start_seen)) | search diff_end > 0| spath input=service_info port | spath net_info{0}.agg output=Net| eval Network=if(isnull(Net), "Unknown", Net) | rename first_seen as "Service First Seen" | eval Information=coalesce('http.server', 'tls.cn', 'ssh.server.software_version', "No detail") | table ip port app_proto Information "Service First Seen" Network "Host First Seen"

| snhostsearch filter="http_user_agent=*" | spath | rename first_seen as host_first_seen | spath net_info{0}.agg output=network | spath path=http_user_agent{} output=agent_data | mvexpand agent_data | spath input=agent_data | eval time_seen=strptime(first_seen,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eventstats count(ip) as agent_count, min(time_seen) as agent_first_seen by agent | eventstats min(agent_count) AS minHits max(agent_count) AS maxHits | eval agentPrime=(agent_count-minHits)/(maxHits-minHits) | sort agentPrime, agent | addinfo | where agent_first_seen > info_min_time AND agentPrime <= 0.2 | table agent, ip, network, first_seen, host_first_seen, agentPrime

| snhostsearch filter="tls_ja3=*" | spath | rename first_seen as host_first_seen | spath net_info{0}.agg output=network | spath path=tls_ja3{} output=agent_data | mvexpand agent_data | spath input=agent_data | spath input=agent_data path=agent{0} output=agent | eval time_seen=strptime(first_seen,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eventstats count(ip) as agent_count, min(time_seen) as agent_first_seen by hash | eventstats min(agent_count) AS minHits max(agent_count) AS maxHits | eval agentPrime=(agent_count-minHits)/(maxHits-minHits) | sort agentPrime, hash | addinfo | where agent_first_seen > info_min_time AND agentPrime <= 0.2 | table hash, agent, ip, network, first_seen, host_first_seen, agentPrime

| snhostsearch filter="ssh_client=*" | spath | rename first_seen as host_first_seen | spath net_info{0}.agg output=network | spath path=ssh_client{} output=agent_data | mvexpand agent_data | spath input=agent_data | eval time_seen=strptime(first_seen,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eventstats count(ip) as agent_count, min(time_seen) as agent_first_seen by software_version | eventstats min(agent_count) AS minHits max(agent_count) AS maxHits | eval agentPrime=(agent_count-minHits)/(maxHits-minHits) | sort agentPrime, hash | addinfo | where agent_first_seen > info_min_time AND agentPrime <= 0.2 | table software_version, ip, network, first_seen, host_first_seen, agentPrime
